title: Shiitake Mushrooms, Red Pepper And Crispy Seaweed
summary: Shiitake Mushrooms, Red Pepper And Crispy Seaweed might be just the side dish you are searching for. This recipe serves 1 and costs $1.89 per serving. One serving contains 399 calories, 2g of protein, and 42g of fat. 4 people have tried and liked this recipe. It is a good option if you're following a caveman, gluten free, primal, and whole 30 diet. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 45 minutes. If you have mezzo peperone rosso crudo, shitake mushrooms pan roasted, sushi nori seaweed, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 83%. This score is outstanding. Try Asian Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Crispy Fried Shiitake Mushrooms, Vegetable Stir Fry with Fairy Tale Eggplant, Green Bell Pepper and Shiitake Mushrooms, and Lemon Cashew Chicken - Crispy "seaweed" - Creamy, Spicy Potato for similar recipes.
